title: SOLD - 1913 Fatima T200 Chicago Americans (Ray Schalk RC)  SGC 30
author: Archive

posts.post_title: SOLD - 1913 Fatima T200 Chicago Americans (Ray Schalk RC)  SGC 30
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Phil Garry
Good Evening, Collectors:

Up for sale tonight is a very togh 1913 Fatima T200 Chicago Americans card picturing Hall of Famers, Ray Schalk (Rookie Card) and Ed Walsh along with Black Sox members, Ed Cicotte, Buck Weaver and Kid Gleason. This beauty has been graded an SGC 30 by the strict graders at Sportscard Guaranty Company, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review scans of the front and back of the card for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $195.00 dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: vguerrerobb@yahoo.com


[IMG]http://i150.photobucket.com/albums/s120/bcbgcbrcb/RSchalk.jpg[/IMG]


[IMG]http://i150.photobucket.com/albums/s120/bcbgcbrcb/RSchalkB.jpg[/IMG]
